tool_description: Check and detect known pyramid schemes or scams in the financial and cryptocurrency sectors through this API
name: Scams & Pyramid Schemes Checker
title: Scams & Pyramid Schemes Checker

api_list.name: List of scams
api_list.description: Get the full list of registered scams, ordered by name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scams-pyramid-schemes-checker.p.rapidapi.com/v1/list-scams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scams-pyramid-schemes-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
